name: collect
description: Aggregates values from a field into a collection, typically used with groupBy() for collecting multiple values per group. Returns an array containing all values for the specified field within each group.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Array of field names to collect values from, or a single field name

parameters.name: distinct
parameters.description: Whether to collect only unique values

notes: Most commonly used with groupBy() to collect field values for each group. The result field is typically named after the collected field with '_collection' suffix.
